mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (event_no, event_name, event_start, event_end, event_notice, event_cmt) VALUES (#{event_no}, #{event_name}, #{event_start}, #{event_end}, #{event_notice}, #{event_cmt})
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET event_name = #{event_name}, event_start = #{event_start}, event_end = #{event_end}, event_notice = #{event_notice}, event_cmt = #{event_cmt} WHERE event_no = #{event_no}

choose.when: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no, t.* FROM ( SELECT e.event_no, e.event_name, e.event_start, e.event_end, e.event_notice, et.img_no, et.system_name, et.origin_name, et.img_size, et.img_type, et.img_path FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_thumbnail et ON e.event_no = et.event_no WHERE e.event_end >= SYSDATE ORDER BY e.event_no DESC ) t ) WHERE no BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
choose.otherwise: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no, t.* FROM ( SELECT e.event_no, e.event_name, e.event_start, e.event_end, e.event_notice, et.img_no, et.system_name, et.origin_name, et.img_size, et.img_type, et.img_path FROM event e LEFT JOIN event_thumbnail et ON e.event_no = et.event_no WHERE event_end < SYSDATE ORDER BY e.event_end DESC, e.event_no DESC ) t ) WHERE no BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

choose.when: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/#{numberPerPage}) FROM event WHERE event_end >= SYSDATE
choose.otherwise: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/#{numberPerPage}) FROM event WHERE event_end < SYSDATE
